means: （力量、健康、品格、权力、价值等的）衰退

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"拒绝"之意。
means: refuse ： 语气较重，指态度坚决，肯定无疑的拒绝。
decline ： 指婉言谢绝他人的帮助或邀请等。
reject ： 多指由于某物某事某行为不能让人满意而被当面直截了当地拒绝。
repel ： 作"拒绝"解时，语气比reject强。
deny ： 指坚决地拒绝接受、给予或承认。

word_mean: 减退期：疾病或发作的减退期
衰退：体力及脑力的逐渐退化或消耗

sentence.Network_en: After years of neglect and decline the city was cleaning itself up.
sentence.Network_cn: 多年的玩忽职守和经济萧条过后，这个城市在进行自我整顿。

sentence.Network_en: The electoral fortunes of the Liberal Democratic party may decline.
sentence.Network_cn: 自由民主党的选举运势可能会下降。

sentence.Network_en: He criticised the government for failing to halt economic decline.
sentence.Network_cn: 他批评政府未能遏止经济下滑。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French decliner, from Latin declinare 'bend down, turn aside', from de- 'down' + clinare 'to bend'

entry.def: If something declines, it becomes less in quantity, importance, or strength.

example.ex: The number of staff has declined from 217,000 to 114,000...
example.tran: 员工人数从 21.7万减少到了11.4万。

example.ex: Hourly output by workers declined 1.3% in the first quarter...
example.tran: 第一季度工人每小时的产量下降了 1.3%。

entry.def: If you decline something or decline to do something, you politely refuse to accept it or do it.

example.ex: The band declined to comment on the story...
example.tran: 乐队拒绝对这一报道作任何评论。

entry.def: If there is a decline in something, it becomes less in quantity, importance, or quality.

example.ex: There wasn't such a big decline in enrollments after all...
example.tran: 注册人数终究还是没有出现如此大幅度的下降。
公元5世纪时罗马的衰落

entry.def: If something is in decline or on the decline, it is gradually decreasing in importance, quality, or power.

example.ex: Thankfully the smoking of cigarettes is on the decline...
example.tran: 令人欣慰的是，吸烟量在逐渐下降。

example.ex: He is still one of the world's most popular golfers, but his game is in decline.
example.tran: 他仍是世界上最受欢迎的高尔夫球选手之一，但他的球技日不如前。

entry.def: If something goes or falls into decline, it begins to gradually decrease in importance, quality, or power.

example.ex: Libraries are an investment for the future and they should not be allowed to fall into decline.
example.tran: 图书馆是对未来的一项投资，不应任其日趋萎缩。

means.word_mean: 1. change toward something smaller or lower
2. a condition inferior to an earlier condition; a gradual falling off from a better state
3. a gradual decrease; as of stored charge or current

sentences.sentence: "he declined to join the group on a hike"

means.word_mean: 7. inflect for number, gender, case, etc., "in many languages, speakers decline nouns, pronouns, and adjectives"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dis不+inclined[[adj.倾向于,赞成的]]不兜摹鷄dj.不愿意的
incline[v.倾斜;偏向]+ed……的→adj.倾向于,赞成的
clin床+ic医学有关→n.门诊部, 临床
decline[v.倾斜;衰退]+ation表名词→n.衰退;下倾
in进入+clin倾斜,斜坡+e→进入斜→偏向,喜爱

Sentence.sentence: Mass market paperbacks, which have been declining for years anyway, will probably disappear, as will hardbacks for mysteries, thrillers, "romance fiction," etc.
when nearly one-quarter of the workforce was unemployed, the divorce rate had declined by around 25% from 1929 But this doesn't mean people were suddenly happier with their marriages.
It has tens the decline of the written word.
The decline started in the 1950s, when manufacturing generated a sturdy 28% of the national income, or gross domestic product, and employed one-third of the workforce.
That's one explanation for the decline in traditional craftsmanship

means.word_mean: 下降, 减少, 衰退

sentences.en: There has been a sharp decline in profits this year.
sentences.cn: 今年的利润大幅度下降。

sentences.en: We asked her to come to our party, but she declined.
sentences.cn: 我们请她来参加我们的晚会, 但是她谢绝了。

sentences.en: The boy declined to answer a question.

means.word_mean: (道路、物体等)下倾，下垂，下降，下落，歪斜，倾斜

sentences.en: The hill declines to the river.
Her popularity declined after 1990's and be retired.
sentences.cn: 20世纪90年代之后她的名望下降并退休了。

sentences.en: She has declined into a street girl.

means.word_mean: 拒绝，拒不(做、进入、考虑等)

sentences.en: He declined to address the delegates.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝向代表们发表讲话。

means.word_mean: 使倾斜，使下倾，使下降；使低垂，使下垂；使歪斜

sentences.en: She came into the room with her head declined.

jushi.chinese: 今年的利润大幅度下降。

jushi.english: We asked her to come to our party, but she declined.
jushi.chinese: 我们请她来参加我们的晚会,但是她谢绝了。

jushi.english: The ground on each side declines gently.
jushi.chinese: 地面的两侧略向下倾斜。
